Description:
Detects when an attacker registers a new IFilter for an extension. Microsoft Windows Search uses filters to extract the content of items for inclusion in a full-text index.
You can extend Windows Search to index new or proprietary file types by writing filters to extract the content, and property handlers to extract the properties of files.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Register New IFiltre For Persistence
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (((target_object like '%\SOFTWARE\Classes\.%' and target_object like '%\PersistentHandler%') or (target_object like '%\SOFTWARE\Classes\CLSID%' and target_object like '%\PersistentAddinsRegistered\{89BCB740-6119-101A-BCB7-00DD010655AF}%')) and  not ((target_object like '%\CLSID\{4F46F75F-199F-4C63-8B7D-86D48FE7970C}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{4887767F-7ADC-4983-B576-88FB643D6F79}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{D3B41FA1-01E3-49AF-AA25-1D0D824275AE}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{72773E1A-B711-4d8d-81FA-B9A43B0650DD}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{098f2470-bae0-11cd-b579-08002b30bfeb}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{1AA9BF05-9A97-48c1-BA28-D9DCE795E93C}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{2e2294a9-50d7-4fe7-a09f-e6492e185884}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{34CEAC8D-CBC0-4f77-B7B1-8A60CB6DA0F7}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{3B224B11-9363-407e-850F-C9E1FFACD8FB}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{3DDEB7A4-8ABF-4D82-B9EE-E1F4552E95BE}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{5645C8C1-E277-11CF-8FDA-00AA00A14F93}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{5645C8C4-E277-11CF-8FDA-00AA00A14F93}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{58A9EBF6-5755-4554-A67E-A2467AD1447B}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{5e941d80-bf96-11cd-b579-08002b30bfeb}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{698A4FFC-63A3-4E70-8F00-376AD29363FB}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{7E9D8D44-6926-426F-AA2B-217A819A5CCE}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{8CD34779-9F10-4f9b-ADFB-B3FAEABDAB5A}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{9694E38A-E081-46ac-99A0-8743C909ACB6}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{98de59a0-d175-11cd-a7bd-00006b827d94}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{AA10385A-F5AA-4EFF-B3DF-71B701E25E18}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{B4132098-7A03-423D-9463-163CB07C151F}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{d044309b-5da6-4633-b085-4ed02522e5a5}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{D169C14A-5148-4322-92C8-754FC9D018D8}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{DD75716E-B42E-4978-BB60-1497B92E30C4}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{E2F83EED-62DE-4A9F-9CD0-A1D40DCD13B6}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{E772CEB3-E203-4828-ADF1-765713D981B8}\%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{eec97550-47a9-11cf-b952-00aa0051fe20}%' or target_object like '%\CLSID\{FB10BD80-A331-4e9e-9EB7-00279903AD99}\%') or (process_path like 'C:\Windows\System32\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\%')))
